title: ‘It’s Surreal’: Iranians in Disbelief After Supreme Leader Is Killed
summary_full: Large crowds of people celebrated the killing of Ayatollah Ali Khamenei in American and Israeli strikes, while many others gathered to mourn.
summary_public: Large crowds of people celebrated the killing of Ayatollah Ali Khamenei in American and Israeli strikes, while many others gathered to mourn.

IL.label: positive
